comment: " Barbara Jean Trenton , struck down by hit-and-run years , trying desperately to get the license number of fleeting fame . " What great writing . Here's a closer look at TZ's The Sixteen-Millimeter Shrine : <URL> <URL>

      :snt2 (w / write-01
            :mod (g2 / great
                  :degree (a / amr-unknown)))

            :ARG1 (b / book

                        :op2 "Sixteen-Millimeter"

comment: I like it for the Sunset Boulevard Sherlock Jr mashup but as someone who enjoys old stuff the nostalgia shaming hits close to home .
amr:
